animeTitle: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan: Mo Dao Zheng Feng
animeDescription: A dull old man and his handsome best friend were summoned to another world by a naked goddess! However, because of the goddess's mischief, he has turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!! "An old man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome old man"! Let the madness-filled, rom-com journey in another world begin!! (Source: MU, edited)
animeCharacters: ['Tachibana, Hinata', 'Jinguuji, Tsukasa', 'Narrator', 'Lou, Tilolilo Lilili', 'Goddess of Love and Beauty']
animeStaff: [['Yamai, Sayaka', 'Director'], ['Kameyama, Toshiki', 'Sound Director'], ['Tsurusaki, Yuu', 'Original Creator'], ['Takeuchi, Toshimitsu', 'Series Composition']]
